title: The Wind in the willows
creator_credit: Dave Unwin, John Coates, Carlton UK, HIT Entertainment Pictures and TVC London
brief_description: Narrated by Vanessa Redgrave, this is an animated adaptation of Kenneth Grahame’s children’s classic “The Wind in the willows.” The adventures of Mole, Rat, Badger and Toad have delighted children for generations. Animated by the team who created “The World of Peter Rabbit and friends”, this production features the voices of Rik Mayall as Toad, Michael Palin as Rat, Alan Bennett as Mole and Michael Gambon as Badger.
